item.title: Migrating SVN repositories to Git, The Right Way
item.description: Yuval takes our hand and guides us through the proper process for migrating your SVN repository to Git: Having an accurate revision control history is very helpful for tracking down regressions. Here's my take on how to do this properly. Hopefully someone can use this to migrate over Catalyst-Runtime to our spanking new Catalyst git repository.
